concept.title: 519.506 Withdrawing or modifying small business set-asides.

conbody.p: If the contracting officer and the SBTA disagree over the withdrawal or modification of a set-aside, the SBTA must notify the AA OSDBU at the same time the matter is referred to the SBA PCR.
